questions.question: You are a student with an A1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 30 words. Describe your family.

answers.answer: I have a big family with five members. I live with my parents and two siblings in a small house. My mom is a teacher and my dad works in a bank. My younger sister is a student, like me. We are a happy family.
